Verses: 1 thariyu Raajaa Arasaanda Naalaam Varusham, Kisle Ennum Onbadhaam Maadham, Naalaanthedhiyile, Sagariyaavukkuk Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaayitru.

3 naangal Iththanai Varushamvaraiyile Seydhadhupola Aindhaam Maadhaththile Azhudhu Odukkaththilirukkavendumo Endru Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Aalayaththilirukkum Aasaariyaridaththilum Theerkkadharisigalidaththilum Ketkavum, Saredhserum Rekemmelegum Avanudaiya Manusharum Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukku Anuppappattaargal.
4 appozhudhu Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

5 nee Dhesaththin Ellaa Janaththodum Aasaariyargalodum Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Neengal Indha Ezhubadhu Varushamaaga Aindhaam Maadhaththilum Ezhaam Maadhaththilum Ubavaasampanni Dhukkankondaadinapodhu Neengal Enakkendrudhaanaa Ubavaasampannineergal.
6 neengal Pusikkirapodhum Kudikkirapodhum Ungalukkendrallavaa Pusikkireergal? Ungalukkendrallavaa Kudikkireergal?

7 erusalemum Adhai Sutrilumirundha Pattanangalum Kudiniraindhu Sugamaayirundhakaalaththilum, Therkunaadum Samaboomiyum Kudiyeriyirundha Kaalaththilum Munnirundha Theerkkadharisigalaikkondu Karththar Koorina Vaarththaigal Ivaigal Allavo Endru Sol Endraar.
8 pinbu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Sagariyaavukku Undaagi, Avar:
9 senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Neengal Unmaiyaai Nyaayantheerththu, Avanavan Thanthan Sagodharanukku Dhayavum Irakkamum Seydhu,

10 vidhavaiyaiyum Thikkatra Pillaiyaiyum Paradhesiyaiyum Sirumaiyaanavanaiyum Odukkaamalum, Ungalil Oruvanum Than Sagodharanukku Virodhamaaith Than Irudhayaththil Theengu Ninaiyaamalum Irungal Endraar.
11 avargalo Gavanikka Manadhillaamal Thangal Tholai Murattuththanamaai Vilakki, Kelaadhapadikkuth Thangalsevigalai Adaiththukkondaargal.

12 vedhaththaiyum Senaigalin Karththar Thammudaiya Aaviyin Moolamaai Mundhina Theerkkadharisigalaikkondu Solliyanuppina Vaarththaigalaiyum Kelaadhapadikkuth Thangal Irudhayaththai Vairaakkiyamaakkinaargal; Aagaiyaal Magaa Kadunkobam Senaigalin Karththaridaththilirundhu Undaayitru.
13 aadhalaal Naan Kooppittapodhu, Avargal Eppadi Kelaamarponaargalo Appadiye Avargal Kooppittapodhu Naanum Kelaamalirundhenendru Senaigalinkarththar Sollugiraar.

14 avargal Ariyaadha Purajaadhigalukkulle Avargalaip Parakkadiththen; Adhinaal Avargal Pinvaiththuppona Dhesam Pokkuvaraththillaamal Paazhaaippoyitru; Avargal Inbamaana Dhesaththaip Paazhaaippogappanninaargal Endraar.
